module.name: Weekly Lottery
module.author: KyleMassacre, MrDJK
module.description: Players can buy lottery tickets to win the jackpot at the end of the week

key.name: lottoMaxTickets
key.description: Max tickets a user may have

key.name: lottoJackpot
key.description: This is the jackpot for the weekly lotto and do not change this or players may be real unhappy about it

key.name: lottoJackPerc
key.desctiption: This is the key that sets the amount of money that will be deducted from the player to be put in for the jackpot

key.name: lottoDateRun
key.description: Sets the date for the weekly drawing

key.name: lottoJackStart
key.desctiption: Enter 0 to start with no jackpot, otherwise enter a value for the jackpot to start each week.

key.name: lottoWinDifficulty
key.desctiption: A difficulty value to win the lottory from 1-this value. This will randomize from 1 to this value and if this value equals the random number you have a winner
